title: Ask Kara and Scott!
summary:
You send us great questions, and we owe you answers. On this episode, we open up the listener mailbag, fielding queries such as: What's the best way to change jobs? How does Kara prepare for her interviews? Why isn't Scott on Shark Tank? Plus, the dating advice you didn't know you needed...and more!
Submit your Listener Mail questions for a future episode by calling us at 855-51-PIVOT, or via Yappa, atÂ nymag.com/pivot.
